entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @JoeBiden 1/ This is all from the populist leader playbook, folks. "As the number of COVID-19 cases & deaths in Brazil climbed thru out May, Brazilian Pres Bolsonaro was criticized by global leaders 4 continuing to say the virus wasn’t  a significant threat 4 country.”- @TheGardianNews
